casebody.data:
No. 10-10120. Harry Smith, Jr., Petitioner v. Harold W. Clarke, Director, Virginia Department of Corrections. 563 U.S. 1038, 131 S. Ct. 2972,

180 L. Ed. 2d 256,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4337. June 6, 2011.

Petition for writ of certio-rari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 406 Fed. Appx. 701.
